short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool that removes niche interests from Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool allows the user to remove the niche interests (for Interest Based Ad Targeting) that could pose a privacy risk for the user
